Disease.Name: NEUROPATHY, HEREDITARY MOTOR AND SENSORY, RUSSE TYPE (HMSNR)
Disease.Summary: very rare;autosomal recessive;mutation in the HK1 gene

symtomp.symptom: defect of walking, running, rising or climbing

literature.title: De novo variants in HK1 associated with neurodevelopmental abnormalities and visual impairment
